trends: There have been no other sightings in Tiverton

divs: Sighting Detailsdriving north on 138 in tiverton i noticed an incredibly bright flamelike object traveling overhead. at first glance i thought it could be a missle. it came closer to me causing me to swerve off the road. i took a right on hayden ave to get a better look and try and take a pic of it with my phone. but as i parked i could see it slowing and then hovering and before i could click my camera, the flames just went out and i could no longer see where it went. there was no sound whatsoever coming from this object. the edges of this object were jagged in appearance and i could not tell what shape the actual moving object was. it was low flying a few hundred feet above power lines which really scared me. never, ever in my 52 yrs have i seen anything so foreign. i am curious how many others saw what i did. i could not have been alone. and i am certain of one thing....whatever the technology used to fly this object, it is unknown to me and i am most intrigued as to whether there could be beings aboard or if it is a droid. i was panicked and amazed and truly shaken by what i saw. i immediately called my bf at work, who called up this website and i told him as soon as i got in the house i would post.
